main.name: Mohammed Naqhid
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

education.description: Attending Microverse involved the study of Algorithms and Data Structures, SQL syntax and statements, Full Stack Web Development with Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React and Redux. Also based on mockups and a broad list of requirements, it was required to build complex web applications and terminal utilities.
Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) course in Information Technology covers both technical and management aspects of computer-based tools.

testimonials.text: I worked with Alexandru at Microverse. Alexandra is detailed orientated, has advanced system engineering and problem-solving skills. He has the ability to effectively manage several tasks at a time.
